Posts.EditableText: niche game that I have not found, it is something like that. Then where you are an orphan to whom the owner asks to pay the rent to stay living there, at first you can modify your character before playing, he has states of emotions, lust, tiredness, happiness, cleanliness, etc. , the character is in bits, it is mainly about text and decisions, it can have situations of abuse from which we must escape, you have several actions, such as hitting, comforting, screaming to attract people etc ... as it is called, it is a game in html
